document.full_text: wisconsin governor scott walker released on wednesday bond restructuring and other plans to close a current year budget gap that were cut from a controversial law to curb the powers of public sector unions.
document.title: wisconsin governor releases bond restructuring bill
lines_and_colors: wisconsin governor scott walker released on wednesday bond restructuring and other plans to close a current year budget gap that were cut from a controversial law to curb the powers of public sector unions.
